title: vc-mapper.schema
description: The model for a vc mapper

type.description: the unique type of the mapper

match.description: the value to dereference when deciding to run this mapper or not

matchEquals.description:
match if the values deeply equal the dereferenced value of `match`
one of matchEquals or matchIncludes must be specified

matchIncludes.description:
match against one value with the array dereferences by `match`
one of matchEquals or matchIncludes must be specified

mapOver.description: a reference to a collection on the offer. If the result of evuating mapOver is a single object then it is treated as a collection of size one.

template.description: the name of an individual item from the mapOver collection

templateMatch.description: when needing to map an offer to multiple types use switch to describe which var is used to determine which mapper to use

templates.description: an array of templates. Each template contains the template as well as the case which represents the value of the switch

matchEquals.description:
match if the values deeply equal the dereferenced value of templateMatch
one of matchEquals or matchIncludes must be specified

matchIncludes.description:
match against one value with the array dereferences by templateMatch
one of matchEquals or matchIncludes must be specified
